product_overview: NepX Creation Website is a premium, ultra-modern IT company website built on Next.js 14 featuring a dark theme, advanced animations including Spline 3D integration, and a comprehensive admin CMS panel. It delivers a sleek user experience for visitors and offers powerful content and site management capabilities through a secure admin dashboard.
core_goals: Provide an engaging and visually impressive homepage leveraging 3D Spline animations and smooth UI transitions.
Offer an informative company presence including detailed about, services, portfolio, testimonials, and contact sections accessible to public users.
Implement an advanced, user-friendly admin panel enabling secure authentication, content management, CRUD operations for services, portfolio, testimonials, and site settings.
Ensure a responsive, accessible, and performant frontend experience with dark theme, glassmorphism UI design, and state-of-the-art animations.
Secure all admin interactions using NextAuth.js with credentials provider and enforce strict API and session protection.
key_features: Homepage with hero section featuring embedded Spline 3D viewer, animated text, gradient backgrounds, and call-to-action elements.
Responsive navigation bar with smooth scroll and mobile-friendly menu.
Public pages covering About, Services, Portfolio, Testimonials, and Contact form with scroll reveal animations.
Contact form with backend API endpoint supporting message submission with validation and server error handling.
Admin authentication using NextAuth.js supporting credential login and secure session management.
Admin dashboard presenting overview statistics, recent activity, and quick action shortcuts.
Content management for hero, about, and contact sections through admin panel.
CRUD functionalities for managing Services with icon and gradient selection.
Portfolio management including project image uploads and category filters.
Testimonial management with rating and client details.
Site settings for editing theme colors, fonts, SEO metadata, and social media links.
User role and permission management in admin panel distinguishing admins and editors.
user_flow_summary: Public users land on the homepage to interact with engaging 3D hero section and navigate through company information sections via responsive navbar.
Users access contact page to submit inquiries via the contact form which interacts with a backend API validating and persisting submissions.
Admin users log in through a secure credentials-based authentication flow with session management via NextAuth.js.
Authenticated admins navigate admin dashboard for monitoring and quick operations.
Admins manage content sections such as hero, about, services, portfolio, testimonials, and general site settings through dedicated admin pages with form-based CRUD operations.
Admins monitor and respond to contact form submissions from the messages management area.
validation_criteria: Homepage loads with embedded Spline 3D viewer properly rendered and animations running smoothly on supported devices.
Navigation bar is fully responsive with functional smooth scrolling and mobile menu toggling.
Contact form submits data to backend API successfully, enforcing required fields and responding with correct HTTP status codes.
Admin authentication restricts access to protected admin routes; invalid login attempts are handled gracefully.
Admin dashboard accurately reflects up-to-date statistics and recent system activity.
All CRUD operations in the admin panel (services, portfolio projects, testimonials) persist changes to the PostgreSQL database correctly.
Site settings edits update the live site appearance including colors, fonts, and SEO metadata.
User role management enforces correct permissions and access control within the admin interface.
Performance benchmarks for page load, animation smoothness, and responsiveness are met across desktop and mobile devices.
Security measures including password hashing, input sanitization, CSRF protection, and rate limiting function as expected to protect sensitive admin functions.
